availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James J. Wood (Muhlenberg County, Kentucky, justice of the peace)

body.p: Muhlenberg County, Kentucky, justice of the peace. Kentucky native. Married Sarah Wood. Father of Mary Wood, Rufus Wood, Laro Wood, Rouseau Wood, and Ludina Wood. Justice of the peace in Muhlenberg County 1860 to 1870.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Muhlenberg County, District 2, p. 62; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Muhlenberg County, Court House Precinct 3, p. 46; Find A Grave, "James J. Wood (1818-1901)," Memorial #80732193, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=80732193 (accessed May 31, 2017); KYR-0001-029-0506.
